markdownRemark.html: <i></i>   <i></i>   <i></i> -7<p><img src="https://cdnone.netlify.com/db/2017/11/c-users-ammar-ahmed-downloads-23-11-2988-jpg.jpeg"/></p> <p>Ok, so we all agree to the fact that acting is one hell of a task. Wearing uncomfortable and heavy costumes, working constantly from dusk till dawn, acting outdoors in extreme weathers without the clothing appropriate for that weather, and sometimes performing stunts without any precautionary measure and risking one’s life for just a single scene is nothing every person can do. It requires nerves and courage and we love our beloved TV and Silver screen stars for doing such things.</p> <p>However sometimes actors, like all of us, also are brought into such scenarios where they are on the horns of Dilemma and are not able to act in some specific scenes due to some personal and ethical values which are an important aspects of their personal lives. There are some of the very well-known and versatile actors and actresses all across the globe who do not give a second thought to film some scenes and simply say “NO” to the film directors no matter how much it costs them.</p> <p>In our views, there is nothing bad in saying “NO” to act in certain scenes. Every person has his or her own fears, sensitivities, and personal point of views when it comes to filming some scene. When any scene does not resonate with the personalities of the actors, they refuse to act in them which is totally understandable for a reasoning brain.</p> <p>Let us have a look at top 10 famous scenes which our beloved actors and actresses refused to film in and also at the reasons due to which they didn’t act in those scenes.</p> <h2>10. When Michelle Rodriguez Had To Deceive Her Love In “The Fast And The Furious”.</h2> <img src="https://cdnone.netlify.com/db/2017/11/word-image-1367.jpeg"/>Wikipedia <p>Little do we know about anything that went on behind the scenes in the filming of “The Fast and The Furious” series. Despite the fact that all the repute which Michelle got was from her splendid acting in the “Fast and The Furious”, she is said to have been involved in a very strong argument with the movie producers during the filming. It has been narrated by the actress herself that she had cried and pleaded in front of the film makers because she was not comfortable in filming for a specific scene.</p> <p>She also said that she requested them not to sue her for not being able to do that scene. Well you must be wondering what was it that bothered Michelle so much. Answering to this, she said that this all happened when the makers decided to introduce a love triangle in to the film, with Michelle being a slut in it. Thankfully, she succeeded and the makers cancelled their plans of adding any such thing in the plot.</p> <h2>9. When Kirk Cameron Had To Get Extra Intimate With A Girl For “Fireproof”.</h2> <img src="https://cdnone.netlify.com/db/2017/11/word-image-1368.jpeg"/>Wikipedia <p>Kirk Cameron is loved by everyone due to his amazing acting. However, by the time when he was filming for his film “Fireproof”, he had become so much rigid in his faith that he plainly refused to get extra intimate with his on screen wife. Therefore, they had to bring in Cameron’s real wife as a co-star for filming intimate scenes.</p> <h2>8. When Penelope Had To Hide Her Body In The “Pirates Of Caribbean 4”</h2> <img src="https://cdnone.netlify.com/db/2017/11/word-image-1369.jpeg"/>Wikipedia <p>During the shoot of the “Pirates of Caribbean 4”, Penelope Cruz got pregnant and hence had to hide her baby bump. In some scenes where the actress had to show her full body, her sister had to be filmed in her place which went well due to their striking resemblance.</p> <h2>7. When Alyson Hannigan Could Not Bear The Smoking Habit Of Her Co-Star In “How I Met Your Mother”</h2> <img src="https://cdnone.netlify.com/db/2017/11/word-image-1370.jpeg"/>Wikipedia <p>Despite the fact that the “How I Met Your Mother” stars, Hannigan and Jason Segel have and amazing chemistry, it was revealed that Alyson Hannigan faced some sort of difficulty while filming for some scenes in this project because of Segel’s Smoking habits. She used to ask Segel to wash off his mouth before filming for the intimate scenes because of her hatred for that foul smoking’s smell.</p>     <h2>6. When The “Blade: Trinity’s” Main Casts Had Issues With Wesley Snipes</h2> <img src="https://cdnone.netlify.com/db/2017/11/word-image-1371.jpeg"/>Wikipedia <p>It is said that the casts of “Blade: Trinity” had encountered so many issues while filming with Snipes because of the fact that he would smoke weed all day long and would never come out of his Trailer. It was also revealed later that Snipe’s interest in cooperating with the co-stars was almost zero which caused him to be fired from the authorization.</p> <h2>5. When Emma Watson Stormed Off the Sets Due To Channing’s Disgusting Break Dance in “This Is the End”</h2> <img src="https://cdnone.netlify.com/db/2017/11/word-image-1372.jpeg"/>Wikipedia <p>In the movie, “This Is The End”, Emma Watson and Channing Tantum were co-stars. It was reported that during the filming, Channing decided to show his break dancing talent in front of Emma, but Emma didn’t like it and she walked away. Therefore, the shooting had to be cancelled at that moment. Afterwards, Emma was not comfortable with filming a scene that was full of nudity so she left the movie.</p> <h2>4. When Lena Heady Faced Difficulty in Pacing The “Walk Of Shame” In “G.O.T”</h2> <img src="https://cdnone.netlify.com/db/2017/11/word-image-1373.jpeg"/>Wikipedia <p>“Game Of Thrones” is famous for its scenes full of nudity and although Heady was always comfortable with them, she refused to do that one specific scene in which she was asked to walk totally naked in front of a crowd which would yell and curse at her. Therefore, they had to film a fake body in her place. It was later revealed that the actresses’ reluctance to do that scene was due to her pregnancy.</p> <h2>3. When Nina Dobrev Refused To Get Intimate With Her Ex In “The Vampire Diaries”</h2> <img src="https://cdnone.netlify.com/db/2017/11/word-image-1374.jpeg"/>Wikipedia <p>The famous “T.V.D” couple of Nina Dobrev and Ian Somerhalder, that was for some time a real life couple and later broke up because of the fact that Ian dumped Nina for Nikki Reed, went a little extra and showed some unprofessionalism while filming for the tv show too. It is said that once Nina had refused to act in her last Kissing scene with Ian in the “T.V.D” because of this breakup.</p> <h2>2. When Dwayne Johnson And Vin Diesel Could Not Tolerate Each Other In The “Fate Of The Furious”</h2> <img src="https://cdnone.netlify.com/db/2017/11/word-image-1375.jpeg"/>quirkybyte <p>These two actors have been in a feud since Johnson had posted a video with somewhat rude caption on Insta Gram. The caption was all about the fact that Johson didn’t have a good time with his male co-actors and after that the news spread like fire in the place. It was said that both these male actors were divas on sets and were poles apart too. They also didn’t have many scenes together in this part of the movie “The Fast and The Furious” too. It is still being said that these two actors hate each other and hence directors are reluctant to cast them together again ever.</p> <h2>1. When Ryan Gosling Got A Day Of Filming “The Notebook” Cancelled Because Of His Hatred For McAdams</h2> <img src="https://cdnone.netlify.com/db/2017/11/word-image-1376.jpeg"/>Wikipedia <p>We all love “The Notebook” for its un-paralleled romantic and touchy lines and we all have cried at the end too. But almost all of us were previously unaware of the fact that the lead casts that were Ryan Gosling and Rachel McAdams have cried more than us during the filming.</p>     <p>This was not because of the fact that they felt the intensity of the story too much, but because that these two hated each other and at one point in filming the movie, they had to take a whole day off because Ryan left the sets after getting frustrated with Rachel. But somehow, the makers sorted that out and the film was at least recorded successfully.</p>   <i></i>

frontmatter.description: How we see different characters in movies is not always the same in real. We assume the actors playing to be really good at their work however sometimes the same role is declined by a lot of artists already. In this article we will talk about the artists who have rejected certain roles for certain reasons.
